metadata.title: Topwholesalejewel Silver Crystal Rhinestone Pearl Drop with Silver Ends Dangle Earrings & White Pearl Center Piece Necklace Jewelry Set
features: High quality silver plating will never tarnish
The necklace measures approximately 16" long with a 3" extender
The matching earrings measure 1" long and 0.8g in weight
description: This jewelry set is stunning! This lovely necklace is completed with matching earrings. It is encrusted with clear, sparkling rhinestones along a silver plate. The necklace measures approximately 16" long with a 3" extender. The matching earrings measure 1" long and 0.8g in weight. It is perfect for weddings, proms, formals, parties, pageants, and more. It coordinates with any color or style wedding dress or formal ensemble.
